summary: Marilyn Manson is an American rock band formed in 1989 by singer Marilyn Manson and guitarist Daisy Berkowitz. They started as "Marilyn Manson & the Spooky Kids" and became popular for their dramatic live shows. The band's name comes from combining female icons' first names with male killers' last names. They released hit albums like "Antichrist Superstar" and "Mechanical Animals" in the late 1990s. Known for shocking behavior and controversial lyrics, they faced protests and bans. Despite a decline in mainstream popularity, they're still influential in rock music, with over 50 million records sold worldwide.
title: Marilyn Manson (band)
